revised_title: Advancements in Joint Replacement Prostheses for Rheumatoid Arthritis Treatment
tldr: The article discusses the development and advancements of joint replacement prostheses for treating rheumatoid arthritis in the hand. It highlights various types of prostheses, their designs, and materials used, as well as the challenges and future developments in this field. The importance of patient selection and objective assessment methods is also emphasized.
